item.description:
Join us for a fun night of salsa dancing at the Havana Club in Central Sq., Cambridge. There is a lesson from 9-10pm- (the teachers are very good) then lots of dancing. All levels are welcome! We're going to meet at 8:45pm next to the payment table, so we will have a few minutes to chat and meet each other before the lesson starts. Please arrive on time! Admission is $12 and there is a cash bar available as well. This is always a fun night!

Check out the Havana Club at: http://www.havanaclubsalsa.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) directly behind the payment table inside the main event area- located upstairs. Call 774 232 0000 if you have trouble finding us.
item.name: Salsa Lesson and Dancing, Havana Club, Cambridge
